p: A virus stock of influenza virus A/turkey/Turkey/1/2005 (H5N1) was prepared by two passages in 10-day-old embryonated chicken eggs. The harvested allantoic fluid was titrated on Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK) cells according to standard methods [46] and reached an infectious virus titer of 10 8.4 TCID 50/ml. It was diluted with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) to obtain a final titer of 10 6.5 TCID 50/ml. All experiments with HPAIV H5N1 were performed under Biosafety Level 3+ conditions.
